name: Plot Correlations
description: Plots correlation matrix for the given variables.

inputParameters.name: variables
inputParameters.description: List of names of the variables to be plotted.

inputParameters.name: output_type
inputParameters.description: Plot type: 'static' creates a bitmap image, 'interactive' launches an interactive plot in a browser.

inputParameters.name: plot
inputParameters.description: Set to True to (re-)create the plot.

inputParameters.name: scale
inputParameters.description: Resize factor for the static plot.

outputParameters.name: img
outputParameters.description: Bitmap image if output_type is 'static', otherwise None.
